price: Ili ahakikishe Haki na auvunje upotovu na wangachukia wakosefu.
arabic: لِيُحِقَّ ٱلۡحَقَّ وَيُبۡطِلَ ٱلۡبَٰطِلَ وَلَوۡ كَرِهَ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُونَ
footnotes: Ili athibitishe Haki, na auondoe upotovu, hata wakichukia makafiri ambao wamedhulumu Haki ya Mwenyezi Mungu na Haki ya Waumini na Haki ya nafsi zao wenyewe.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: liyuḥiqqa al-ḥaqa wayub'ṭila al-bāṭila walaw kariha al-muj'rimūna
